title: Presto Professional SaladShooter, Slicer, & Shredder
description:
A great big idea for salads and much more! Slices and shreds right where you want for perfect salads and much, much more. It delivers professional speed, power, and convenience. Includes thick and thin slice cones, ripple cut cone, shredding cone, and funnel guide.

+ Shreds vegetables, fruits, cheese, nuts, and more
+ Simple to use
+ Professional model
+ Added size, power, and capacity
+ No extra bowls to clean
+ Large food chamber holds whole potatoes and more
+ Adjustable food guide adapts to large or small loads
+ Interchangeable processing cones
+ Handy funnel guide
+ Base wipes clean - other parts dishwasher safe
+ Made in China

asset.author: meijer
asset.description:

A great big idea for salads and much more! Slices and shreds right where you want for perfect salads and much, much more. It delivers professional speed, power, and convenience. Includes thick and thin slice cones, ripple cut cone, shredding cone, and funnel guide.

+ Shreds vegetables, fruits, cheese, nuts, and more
+ Simple to use
+ Professional model
+ Added size, power, and capacity
+ No extra bowls to clean
+ Large food chamber holds whole potatoes and more

transcripts: the Presto professional salad shooter electric slicer shredder the easy way to slice or shred vegetables, fruits, cheese, and more just point and shoot for slices or shreds right where you want with no extra bowls to clean. A handy funnel guide and four interchangeable cones are included for making regular slices thick slices ripple cuts and shreds the professional salad shooter slicer shredder is easy to use too. The interchangeable cones slip right in there are no complicated parts to assemble for added convenience the extra-large food chamber holds whole potatoes and the adjustable food guide adapts to large and small loads and just look at what it can do. Shreds potatoes for hash browns, cheese for pizza and tacos and cabbage for coleslaw, slices bananas, apples, and more for delightful food salad or pie in minutes the professional salad shooter is the perfect companion for all your garden fresh fruits and vegetables even great chocolate, chopped, nuts and makes bread and cracker crumbs. It's easy to clean too, the motor base wipes clean all other parts are dishwasher-safe. The Presto professional salad shooter electric slicer shredder the fast and convenient way to make delicious salads, soups, pizzas, tacos, desserts, and more get one today.
